name: Tricks and Treats (itch)
description:
Submission for Spooky 2D Jam 2021

Make your way back home on Halloween night as you collect candy and either kill or avoid the ghosts that try to steal your candy when you're not looking (for the optional theme of "behind you"). See how much candy you still have when you finish!

Arrow keys or WASD to move. Spacebar to shoot. Backspace to restart.
